articles.title: Anglo American cuts interim dividend as commodity prices soften - News24
articles.description: Group earnings dropped in line with commodity prices while production also slid amid operational challenges.
articles.content:
Anglo American, one of the world's largest miners, has declared a $1.5 billion (~R25 billion) interim dividend, down from $2.1 billion declared in June last year as commodity prices softened.
